nodes.title: Model links
widgets_values:
[Tutorial](https://docs.comfy.org/tutorials/image/qwen/qwen-image-edit)


## Model links

You can find all the models on [Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image_ComfyUI](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image_ComfyUI/tree/main) and  [Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image-Edit_ComfyUI](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image-Edit_ComfyUI) 

**Diffusion model**

- [qwen_image_edit_2509_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image-Edit_ComfyUI/resolve/main/split_files/diffusion_models/qwen_image_edit_2509_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors)

**LoRA**

- [Qwen-Image-Edit-2509-Lightning-4steps-V1.0-bf16.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/lightx2v/Qwen-Image-Lightning/resolve/main/Qwen-Image-Edit-2509/Qwen-Image-Edit-2509-Lightning-4steps-V1.0-bf16.safetensors)

**Text encoder**

- [qwen_2.5_vl_7b_fp8_scaled.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image_ComfyUI/resolve/main/split_files/text_encoders/qwen_2.5_vl_7b_fp8_scaled.safetensors)

**VAE**

- [qwen_image_vae.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Qwen-Image_ComfyUI/resolve/main/split_files/vae/qwen_image_vae.safetensors)

**SDXL Checkpoint**

- [Epic Realism from CivitAI](https://civitai.com/models/277058/epicrealism-xl)
- You are free to replace this with any model of your choice. 
- Same thing for the LoRA. Use one that you have or disable the node.

Model Storage Location

```
üìÇ ComfyUI/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ models/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ diffusion_models/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ qwen_image_edit_2509_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ loras/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Qwen-Image-Lightning-4steps-V1.0.safetensors
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ vae/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ qwen_image_vae.safetensors
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ text_encoders/
‚îÇ   |   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ qwen_2.5_vl_7b_fp8_scaled.safetensors
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ üìÇ checkpoints/
‚îÇ       ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ epicrealismXL_vxviiCrystalclear.safetensors
```

full body portrait of the same character, front-facing, standing in a neutral pose, arms relaxed at sides, detailed accurate clothing and accessories from the reference, realistic proportions, clear lighting, plain background, sharp focus, high resolution, professional character reference sheet style

full body portrait of the same character, back view, standing straight in a neutral pose, arms relaxed at sides, accurate clothing and hairstyle from behind, realistic proportions, plain background, sharp focus, natural lighting, professional character reference sheet style

close-up portrait of the same character, front-facing, neutral expression, looking directly at the viewer, detailed realistic facial features, accurate hairstyle, sharp focus, soft even lighting, plain background, high resolution, professional character reference sheet style

close-up portrait of the same character, left profile view, neutral expression, realistic facial structure and hairstyle, sharp focus, soft even lighting, plain background, professional character reference sheet style

close-up portrait of the same character, right profile view, neutral expression, realistic facial structure and hairstyle, sharp focus, soft even lighting, plain background, professional character reference sheet style
close-up portrait of the same character, back of the head view, showing hairstyle, realistic proportions, sharp focus, plain background, professional character reference sheet style

half-body portrait of the same character, front-facing, neutral pose, arms relaxed, detailed clothing and accessories, realistic proportions, plain background, sharp focus, professional character reference sheet style

half-body portrait of the same character, three-quarter view facing slightly to the right, neutral expression, natural lighting, detailed clothing and accessories, realistic proportions, plain background, sharp focus, professional character reference sheet style

full body portrait of the same character in a dynamic action pose, natural movement and expression, accurate clothing and anatomy, realistic proportions, sharp focus, plain background, professional character reference sheet style

A hyper-realistic half-portrait of a woman, showing her head and upper chest in elegant natural light. Her face remains the main focus, with finely detailed skin texture, luminous eyes that draw attention, and subtle, natural makeup. Soft shadows highlight the contours of her cheeks and collarbone, giving depth and realism. Her hair falls naturally around her shoulders, catching gentle light reflections. The background is softly blurred to emphasize her expression and presence. Photorealistic, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, ultra-detailed skin, realistic proportions, professional portrait photography style, shallow depth of field.

üôè Thank you for your support!

A hyper-realistic half-portrait of a woman, showing her head and upper chest in elegant natural light. Her face remains the main focus, with finely detailed skin texture, luminous eyes that draw attention, and subtle, natural makeup. Soft shadows highlight the contours of her cheeks and collarbone, giving depth and realism. Her hair falls naturally around her shoulders, catching gentle light reflections. The background is softly blurred to emphasize her expression and presence. Photorealistic, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, ultra-detailed skin, realistic proportions, professional portrait photography style, shallow depth of field.

Go to [chatgpt.com](https://chatgpt.com/) and use this prompt:

**Ask:**

Provide a Stable Diffusion positive prompt in natural language. The main focus must be the face, rendered with nice detail. Start with a hyperrealistic half-portrait of a woman (head and chest visible), paying attention to the eyes.

**Result:**

A hyper-realistic half-portrait of a woman, showing her head and upper chest in elegant natural light. Her face remains the main focus, with finely detailed skin texture, luminous eyes that draw attention, and subtle, natural makeup. Soft shadows highlight the contours of her cheeks and collarbone, giving depth and realism. Her hair falls naturally around her shoulders, catching gentle light reflections. The background is softly blurred to emphasize her expression and presence. Photorealistic, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, ultra-detailed skin, realistic proportions, professional portrait photography style, shallow depth of field.

nodes.title: Note: About image size
widgets_values: You can use the latent from the **EmptySD3LatentImage** to replace **VAE Encode**, so you can customize the image size.

nodes.title: Note: KSampler settings
widgets_values:
You can test and find the best setting by yourself. The following table is for reference.

| Model            | Steps | CFG |
|---------------------|---------------|---------------|
| Offical             | 50               | 4.0               
| fp8_e4m3fn             | 20                | 2.5               |
| fp8_e4m3fn + 4steps LoRA    | 4               | 1.0               |

This node is to avoid bad output results caused by excessively large input image sizes. Because when we input one image, we use the size of that input image.

The **TextEncodeQwenImageEditPlus** will scale your input to 1024√ó104 pixels. We use the size of your first input image. This node is to avoid having an input image size that is too large (such as 3000√ó3000 pixels), which could bring bad results.
